Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory627.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront25.png', 4: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=40>Walking through the frigid waters, surrounded by an endless sea...</size></color>', 3: '400'}
{3: 'Walking through the frigid waters, surrounded by an endless sea...'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=40>In the distance, where the sky meets the sea,\\ntwinkling stars dot the horizon.</size></color>', 3: '400'}
{3: 'In the distance, where the sky meets the sea, twinkling stars dot the horizon.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=40>At the center of the sea lies what appears to be a luminous mark,\\nradiating an endless halo of light.</size></color>', 3: '400'}
{3: 'At the center of the sea lies what appears to be a luminous mark, radiating an endless halo of light.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=40>I walk toward it,\\neach step closer bringing more pain.\\nMy heart grows heavier with every moment...</size></color>', 3: '400'}
{3: 'I walk toward it, each step closer bringing more pain. My heart grows heavier with every moment...'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=40>Sorrow silently corrodes my will...</size></color>', 3: '400'}
{3: 'Sorrow silently corrodes my will...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront25.png', 4: '4', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopWhite.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The girl, enshrouded in a faint glow, appears almost transparent, casting no shadow.'}
{3: 'Upon touching her, I feel a bone-chilling cold and, beneath layers of despair, the faintest glimmer of hope.'}
{3: "Her presence isn't unfamiliar at all—on the contrary, it feels deeply familiar."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopWhite.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Why is this so painful? What exactly happened?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryFallStone.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'The moment I ask these questions, the dream shatters instantly.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory524.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nurse', 3: "Good morning. I see you're awake.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Where am I? I should be at the track team's celebration party...", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Wait, what exactly happened in the activity room last night?!', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Nurse', 3: "Please calm down. You've just recovered from a severe concussion. It's natural to feel disoriented.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Severe concussion? What are you talking about?', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Nurse', 3: 'Well, you see, during the celebration party in the activity room last night...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nurse', 3: 'The ceiling suddenly collapsed for some reason and knocked all of you out, so...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "That's ridiculous! I clearly remember someone speaking to us through the broadcast system!", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Nurse', 3: 'Those were hallucinations from your brain injury...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nurse', 3: 'This happens sometimes. Physical trauma can cause temporary memory confusion.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata sits up in the hospital bed and tears off the suspiciously pristine bandage wrapped around her head.'}
{3: "She grabs the nurse's sleeve, gritting her teeth as she fixes them with an intense stare."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Do you even believe that nonsense you just spouted?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nurse', 3: "I-I'm sorry, but that's what I heard from someone else...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nurse', 3: "To be honest... with you acting like this, I really don't know what to do...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nurse', 3: 'I only started my internship at this hospital last week. If the attending physician finds out about this...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Sigh... Forget it.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yata leaps off the bed and charges past the nurses trying to stop her, bursting out of the ward.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1001.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1001.jpg'}
{3: 'Her slippers slap against the floor as she strides forward in her hospital gown.'}
{3: 'An inexplicable urge in her heart drives Yata toward somewhere within the hospital.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory419.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory419.jpg'}
{3: 'After walking for what feels like forever, she slows down in a corner.'}
{3: 'To her left stands a partially open door to a ward, isolated from any other rooms nearby.'}
{3: 'Like something that materialized out of nowhere, an object that feels completely out of place in its surroundings.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory524.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory524.jpg'}
{3: 'Yata gently pushes the door open to find a frail girl lying on the solitary bed. Yata knows her.'}
{3: 'Hearing the movement, the girl struggles to pull herself up into a sitting position.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Yata? So you're here, too...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Why are you back in the hospital? Weren't you doing fine just a few days ago?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm sorry.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Why are you apologizing? It's not like you're the one who made me sick.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "No, Yata... This might sound strange, but you weren't supposed to find me here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I don't have much time left, and I probably won't be going back to school anymore... That's why I wanted to say a proper goodbye.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I might have pulled a few tricks... I hope you can forgive me for being selfish.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "What are you talking about, Yuka? Weren't you getting better?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'You were just talking about becoming an apprentice at the flower shop! Why are you being so pessimistic now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I don't need those things anymore...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I heard that in spiritual Eden, there are gardens more beautiful than anything in the real world.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Spiritual Eden? What is that... Do you even know what's coming out of your mouth?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "When I've filled that place with hydrangeas, Yata, that's when you should come pay me a visit.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "Yuka turns to her side and takes a folded paper fox from the bedside table, placing it in Yata's hands."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Paper foxes?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I don't have anything worth giving you, but please accept this as a parting gift. I folded it while I was still lucid.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "When you see these little ones again someday, please don't forget our promise.", 4: '2'}
{3: "As Yata takes the paper foxes and is about to say something, there's a knock at the door behind her."}
{1: '1', 3: "The person who knocked enters directly, wearing a doctor's white coat. He has clearly overheard their conversation."}
{3: "The doctor shows no surprise at Yata's presence, only staring back with cold indifference."}
{2: 'Doctor?', 3: "I'm afraid you'll have to leave. The patient needs to rest now.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Doctor?', 3: 'Please come back another time, if you would.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Yata rises from her seat in protest, but Yuka holds her hand and nods to the doctor.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Come visit me again another time, Yata.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I'll come back tomorrow. I promise I will.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Goodbye, Yata. Head back to school now.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory419.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Yata leaves with lingering doubts. As she reaches the corridor, something suddenly crosses her mind.'}
{3: "The doctor's cold voice sounds familiar to her, but she can't quite place where she's heard it before."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Time freezes like a paused film, and everything around comes to a sudden halt.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1053.jpg'}
{3: 'The dusk light silently streams through the window onto the floor, while birds outside hang motionless in mid-air.'}
{1: '1', 3: "The surroundings take on an unreal quality, as if they've become part of a photorealistic painting."}
{1: '1', 3: 'In this frozen moment, footsteps echo from behind Yata.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "If only she had recognized the doctor's voice back then... If only she had realized it was Yuka's cry for help...", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "At the very least, she wouldn't have had to watch Yuka head down that dark path alone.", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "In the end, I did nothing. I couldn't change anything at all.", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Even you, as you are now, are nothing but a shadow formed from the depths of my regret.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Did something happen to Yuka?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'On the day of the Punishing outbreak, she was trapped in the laboratory with no way to escape.', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "When the rescue team published their list, Yuka's name appeared under the column of the deceased.", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Years have passed, and this nightmare has haunted me relentlessly—until I came back to this place.', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Only when I saw her through these memories and hallucinations did I finally understand...', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "That Yuka's tragedy didn't end with her death—it began with it.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Yuka's tragedy began with her death?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Decades have passed, and she made her appearance again at the abandoned Misono High ever so quietly.', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'I can only believe that the real Yuka died, and whoever she is now... is something else entirely.', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "And yet, she definitely has Yuka's memories, and...", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "I can't bring myself to see her as an enemy. I just can't think of her as someone I have to fight.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Has Yuka become your enemy?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "She's taken control of the entire island, commandeered Babylonia's strike team, and kidnapped my squadmates.", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "If that doesn't make her an enemy, then what exactly is she trying to do?", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Perhaps she just wanted to see you one last time. After all, you were Yuka's only friend.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Wanted to see me one last time?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "She has always been easily influenced by people, and she's going through puberty, right?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Yes, even after all these years, if her mind hasn't changed...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Then she's really no different from any other teenage girl...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Her brain hasn't fully developed yet, while her personality is still sensitive, and she has many unrealistic ideas about the world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Like a child who never grows up, her soul remains trapped within this school.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "But the same can be said about you, no? I mean, if you're still living with regret now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Your "heart" is just as trapped in this place.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "What am I supposed to do? Everything is the way it is now because I couldn't save her back then.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Then why not try to save her again?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "If she can't find her way out of this on her own, then as her best friend, Yata...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You should be the one to help her. It could be that she probably just can't figure her way out on her own...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I came to see you hoping you could stop her...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Because you're the only person she finds trustworthy, Yata, besides her Dr. Saotome.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'But what if I fail again?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Are you going to let the fear of failure stop you from trying?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Back when you competed in track and field, did you ever hold back just because you were afraid of not winning first place?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You'll never give a race your all if you're afraid of losing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Have you forgotten your own words?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Once you get in the zone, you gradually tune out everyone around you and focus solely on your own pace.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'But I run to surpass myself, not to defeat others...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Your only enemy has always been yourself. All these years, you've never been able to overcome your inner demons.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You run away and refuse to take responsibility because you can't face who you were yesterday.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Don't think, just act. The effort is what counts.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Even if you're bound to fail, you'll need to face the music with honesty.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'You only see your failure to save Yuka, but have you forgotten what you did that day?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Were you really doing nothing? Just waiting for death to come?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "You fought, didn't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Didn't you fight with everything you had?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You might not have been as strong as you'd hoped to be, but you're no longer the Yata you were back then.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "I'm no longer the Yata of yesterday. I stand here as a stronger version of myself...", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Now it's your turn to save her. Please!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{2: '???', 3: "After all these years, this rematch... I'm not losing again this time!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1072.jpg'}
{3: "Yata's hallucination fades away as she emerges from her meditation..."}
{3: 'Reality pulls her back to the battlefield—the derelict school building still shrouded in night.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'In the narrow corridor, three Corrupted loom right before her eyes.'}
{3: "In less than half a second, their weapons will tear right through Yata's flesh..."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Nope, not gonna let that happen!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Yata steps back half a pace, dodging the incoming blades. In that split second as they graze past her...'}
{3: 'She uses the frontmost Corrupted as a pivot point to leap into the air, breaking free from their encirclement.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Think I'm a pushover, huh...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "With a sideway flip, Yata channels the momentum into a kick that shatters the Corrupted's blade."}
{3: 'Landing, crouching, lowering her center of gravity, she charges at full speed—until her blade cleaves the enemy in half...'}
{3: 'Then comes a powerful beam, charged and unleashed...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '1.5'}
{3: 'The brilliant beam floods the dim corridor with daylight...'}
{3: 'Scorched scrap metal and dismembered parts litter the ground around Yata.'}
{3: 'Stepping over the deactivated Corrupted, Yata finds Shiva unconscious at the end of the corridor.'}
{3: 'She kneels down and gently shakes Shiva.'}
{3: 'Silence.'}
{3: 'Not a single wound marks her body, her eyes tightly shut...'}
{3: 'Only the third "eye" on her forehead still emits a faint green light, telling Yata that she\'s still alive.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Damn it, this is not working... Did Yuka do this?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Shiva's kidnapper probably had absolute confidence when they left her in the corridor—an absolute certainty that those under her control wouldn't easily awaken."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Come to think of it, the Corrupted here are growing more restless, and the interference signals are getting stronger... Yuka... have you chosen the Red Tide?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Another wave of intense pain surges through her M.I.N.D., and Yata clutches her head in agony.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "Yata, a six-armed freak... What's going on here? Is there not a single normal person in Scarab?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Hey, are you calling yourself normal when you have three eyes?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "They're for battlefield analysis and signal detection, and observation of...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "All right, all right. There's a lot of uses for my six arms as well—", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "Weren't you bragging about being the best at escaping? How'd you end up surrounded?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'The Corrupted are swarming in, and none of us managed to escape with no one covering our retreat...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "Eight o'clock, high ground. Prepare to break through.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'You idiot, why did you come back?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "Shorthalt is going to give me a real piece of his mind if you don't make it back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Not a single normal person in Scarab... but you all give off some nice frequencies.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "Yata... even if Shorthalt were still here, this mission to investigate the source of the Red Tide anomaly wouldn't be any easier.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "...Something's off with the frequencies in my body...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1072.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Shut up, shut up, shut up!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'You phony mystic, quit talking in your sleep!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'SCREEEEE—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Get away from me!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata snaps awake and sends an approaching Corrupted flying with a punch, but more and more Hetero-Creatures emerge from the shadows of the corridor.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Shorthalt's the type who'd keep nagging at me even as a ghost—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "So, Shiva, even if he's gone now, I'm still taking you back with me!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She bends down to scoop up Shiva as the mechanical arms on her back fan out dramatically.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'What are you waiting for? Come at me all at once, inferior beings.', 4: '1'}
{3: "As the Hetero-Creatures surge forward en masse, a faint smile plays across Yata's lips."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "That's what I'm takling about...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "But let's just keep this in mind...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'This is my school, not your playground to run wild in!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'A deafening explosion rings out, accompanied by the crisp sound of shattering glass...'}
{3: 'Several Hetero-Creatures come hurtling down from the school building.'}
{3: 'In an instant, violent gunfire tears through the second floor, echoing from the stairwell corner to the end of the hallway.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Gotta establish contact with Babylonia now!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1068.jpg'}
{3: "Sprinting full-tilt, Yata makes her way to the school building's rooftop."}
{3: 'Yata quickly sets up the communication anchor and picks Shiva up again to leave.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1072.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1072.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'If everything works properly, communications should be restored in five minutes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "But there's no time to linger here. Yuka's projection keeps growing stronger...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'If this goes on, no one here is ever going to wake up again.', 4: '1'}
